items.sentence: Preparing a room for painting is the most important step in the process.
Tom never forgets to give his wife flowers on their wedding anniversary.
Tom has been avoiding me like the plague ever since he broke my glasses.
Tom has some food allergies, so he has to be careful about what he eats.
Tom has to study hard and catch up with the other students in his class.
Tom is captain of the football team and is on the baseball team as well.
Tom is looking for an apartment with three bedrooms near where he works.
We both know what\'ll happen if we don\'t do what we\'re supposed to do.
What\'s the first thing you\'re going to do when you get back to Boston?
Tom would like to have stayed for dinner, but he had to go back to work.
Tom, which do you prefer, girls with long hair or girls with short hair?
Tom can probably pull some strings for you and get you into that school.
I was driving down Park Street when I saw Tom and Mary walking together.
I was planning on going to the beach today, but then it started to rain.
I wish you would tell me what I ought to do in this difficult situation.
Have you already decided how you\'re going to take care of this problem?
I can\'t believe Tom is still talking about what happened two years ago.
I can\'t help you next Monday, but I can help you the Monday after next.
If Tom knew how to swim, he\'d probably want to go to the beach with us.
If you tell your teacher you lost your homework, she won\'t believe you.
